channel.title: /dev/loop - Audio
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Lincoln Loop podcast
channel.itunes:author: Lincoln Loop
channel.itunes:summary: Lincoln Loopers gather to talk about web development, technology, and anything else that we've found interesting lately.
channel.description: Lincoln Loopers gather to talk about web development, technology, and anything else that we've found interesting lately.

item.title: /dev/loop0
item.itunes:author: Lincoln Loop
item.itunes:summary: Today Brian Luft, Marco Louro, Pete Baumgartner, Brandon Konkle, and Yann Malet talk about configuration management and Salt, Selenium testing in Django 1.4, and the &yet Realtime Conference.
item.description: Today Brian Luft, Marco Louro, Pete Baumgartner, Brandon Konkle, and Yann Malet talk about configuration management and Salt, Selenium testing in Django 1.4, and the &yet Realtime Conference.
item.itunes:keywords: django, python, web development, realtime, salt, config management, configuration, chef, selenium, node.js, socket.io, sock.js, engine.io

item.title: /dev/loop1
item.itunes:author: Lincoln Loop
item.itunes:summary: Brandon Konkle, Michael Trythall, Pete Baumgartner and Yann Malet gather to talk about the Go programming language, SVG graphics, and the Bootstrap toolkit.
item.description: Brandon Konkle, Michael Trythall, Pete Baumgartner and Yann Malet gather to talk about the Go programming language, SVG graphics, and the Bootstrap toolkit.
item.itunes:keywords: django, python, web development, go, programming, svg, graphics, bootstrap, css, javascript

item.title: /dev/loop2
item.itunes:author: Lincoln Loop
item.itunes:summary: Pete Baumgartner, Brian Luft, Graham King, and Brandon Konkle discuss disk encryption and password sharing, client-side or server-side template rendering for Javascript, Django Rest Framework, and Graphite.
item.description: Pete Baumgartner, Brian Luft, Graham King, and Brandon Konkle discuss disk encryption and password sharing, client-side or server-side template rendering for Javascript, Django Rest Framework, and Graphite.
item.itunes:keywords: encryption, backbone, templates, rendering, rest, graphite, django, python, web development, programming, javascript
